name: English (English)
dialog_confirm_delete_all_themes_message: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO DELETE ALL THEMES?
dialog_confirm_delete_theme_message: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO DELETE THIS THEME? THIS PROCESS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
dialog_confirm_overwrite_message: Theme '{theme_name}' already exists. Do you want to overwrite it? All previous changes will be LOST!
dialog_deletion_status_json_error: Theme folder '{}' deletion attempted, but ventoy.json could not be updated due to a JSON error.
dialog_deletion_status_permission_error: Theme folder '{}' deletion attempted, but ventoy.json could not be updated due to a permission error.
dialog_deletion_status_unexpected_error: Theme folder '{}' deletion attempted, but ventoy.json could not be updated due to an unexpected error.
error_7z_bad_file: Failed to extract .7z archive '{}': File is corrupted or not a valid 7z archive.
error_during_remove_all_themes_task: An error occurred while removing all themes: {} {}
error_json_read_message_existing: Failed to read existing ventoy.json: {}. Creating a new one.
error_json_read_remove_message: Failed to read ventoy.json on {drive}. File might be corrupted. Cannot update config.
error_json_read_settings_message: Failed to read ventoy.json on {drive}. File might be corrupted. Cannot apply settings.
error_lz4_module_missing: The 'lz4' library is not installed. Please install it using 'pip install lz4'.
error_lzma_module_missing: LZMA module not found. Cannot extract .xz archives.
error_permission_deleting_folder: Permission denied while deleting folder: {} Make sure the folder is not in use and you have necessary permissions.
error_permission_listing_theme_dir: Permission denied while listing theme directory for deletion.
error_permission_read_json_remove_messag: Permission denied while reading ventoy.json on {drive}. Cannot update config.
error_permission_read_json_settings_mess: Permission denied while reading ventoy.json on {drive}.
error_permission_write_json_settings_mes: Permission denied while writing to ventoy.json on {drive}. Make sure you have write access.
error_py7zr_module_missing: The 'py7zr' library is not installed. Please install it using 'pip install py7zr'.
error_rar_rarfile: Failed to extract .rar archive '{}'. Rarfile error: {}
error_rar_unrar_not_found: Failed to extract .rar archive '{}'. The 'unrar' command was not found or could not be executed. Please install 'unrar' and ensure it is available in PATH. Error: {}
error_rar_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred while extracting .rar archive '{}': {}
error_rarfile_module_missing: The 'rarfile' library is not installed. Please install it using 'pip install rarfile' and ensure the 'unrar' utility is installed and available in your system's PATH.
error_tarlz4_extraction_error: Failed to decompress or extract .lz4 archive '{}': {}
error_tarlz4_invalid_tar: Decompressed file from .lz4 archive '{}' is not a valid tar archive. Please ensure it is a .tar.lz4 file.
error_tarxz_extraction_error: Failed to decompress or extract .xz archive '{}': {}
error_tarxz_invalid_tar: Decompressed file from .xz archive '{}' is not a valid tar archive. Please ensure it is a .tar.xz file.
error_tarzst_extraction_error: Failed to decompress or extract .zst archive '{}': {}
error_tarzst_invalid_tar: Decompressed file from .zst archive '{}' is not a valid tar archive. Please ensure it is a .tar.zst file.
error_task_message: An unexpected error occurred during task: {} {}
error_unexpected_deleting_theme_folder: An unexpected error occurred while deleting theme folder: {}
error_unexpected_read_json_remove_messag: An unexpected error occurred while reading ventoy.json: {}
error_unexpected_read_json_settings_mess: An unexpected error occurred while reading ventoy.json: {}
error_unexpected_write_json_settings_mes: An unexpected error occurred while writing to ventoy.json: {}
error_zstd_module_missing: The 'zstandard' library is not installed. Please install it using 'pip install zstandard'.
info_themes_deleted_json_not_found_messa: Themes deleted, but ventoy.json not found.
install_source_label: Browse or Drag & Drop Theme Archives / Folders
print_decompressed_and_extracting: Decompressed {}. Attempting to extract temporary tar: {}
print_error_finding_theme_index: Error finding theme index in JSON: {}
print_warning_could_not_get_font_path: Warning: Could not get relative path for font file: {}
print_warning_could_not_parse_json: Warning: Could not parse ventoy.json on {}. File might be corrupted or not a valid JSON.
print_warning_failed_read_json_settings: Warning: Failed to read ventoy.json settings from {}: {}
print_warning_invalid_default_file_index: Warning: Invalid default_file index ({}) in ventoy.json. Resetting to Random Theme.
print_warning_permission_denied_listing_: Warning: Permission denied while listing theme directory on {}.
print_warning_permission_denied_read_jso: Warning: Permission denied while reading ventoy.json on {}.
print_warning_theme_folder_not_found_dur: Warning: Theme folder not found during deletion (already removed?): {}
print_warning_theme_folder_not_found_ski: Warning: Theme folder not found, skipping deletion: {}
status_all_themes_removed_config_updated: All themes removed and config updated.
status_failed_list_themes_for_deletion: Failed to list themes for deletion.
status_no_supported_dropped_items: No supported items found in dropped items.
status_no_themes_found_in_directory: No themes found in directory to delete.
status_unexpected_error_deletion: An unexpected error occurred during deletion.
status_themes_applied_success: Themes applied and config updated successfully!
warning_busy_message: Another operation is already in progress.
warning_default_file_index_invalid: Warning: default_file index {} in ventoy.json points to an invalid theme path/name. Resetting to Random.
warning_partial_deletion_message_permiss: Could not delete theme folder '{}' due to permissions. Attempting to update ventoy.json.
warning_partial_deletion_message_unexpec: Could not delete theme folder '{}' due to an unexpected error. Attempting to update ventoy.json.
warning_resolution_not_in_list: Warning: Selected resolution '{}' is not in the allowed list. Keeping current or default.
warning_selected_default_theme_not_found: Selected default theme '{}' not found in ventoy.json. Resetting to Random Theme.
Selected default theme '{}' not found in ventoy.json. Resetting to Random Theme.
warning_skipping_directory_message: Skipping directory '{}' as it does not appear to be a theme folder (theme.txt not found inside).
warning_theme_txt_not_found_message: theme.txt not found in processed theme '{}'. This theme might not work correctly.
warning_ventoy_json_not_found_settings_m: ventoy.json not found on selected drive. Cannot apply settings.
status_added_dropped_theme_folders_from_: Added {} theme folder(s) from dropped folder '{}'.
warning_skipping_directory_content_warni: Skipping directory '{}' as it does not contain supported theme archives or theme folders.
